    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        optional method that runs after the fxml file is finished loading.

      • productCancelButtonListener

        public void productCancelButtonListener()
        event listener for the cancel button. clears the form and closes the window.

      • productSaveButtonListener

        public void productSaveButtonListener()
        RUNTIME ERROR - saving without changes still caused an IndexOutOfBoundsException as the object address was changed(caused by updating with an empty ObservableList). fixed by assigning newProduct to selectedProduct after each invocation.

        event listener for the save button. validates the user input, creates a product with the associated parts, and updates Inventory.

      • partAddButtonListener

        public void partAddButtonListener()
        event listener for the 'Add' button in the part table. adds selectedPart to ephemeralParts to be eventually added to the Product object.

      • partRemoveButtonListener

        public void partRemoveButtonListener()
        event listener for the 'Remove associated part' button. removes selectedAssociatedPart from ephemeralParts before ephemeralParts is added to the Product object.

      • partSelectListener

        public void partSelectListener()
        RUNTIME ERROR - Clicking on an empty row caused an IndexOutOfBoundsException thrown by getSelectedItem(). Implemented a check for an empty selection.

        event listener to detect selection of a part from the part table

      • associatedPartSelectListener

        public void associatedPartSelectListener()
        event listener to detect selection of an associatedPart from the associatedParts table.

      • partSearchBarListener

        public void partSearchBarListener()
        Listens for the enter key in the parts searchbar. partName could potentially be a String of number characters. parts are searched by String first. if the string can be parsed into an int, search for partId as well, and append to the initial results

      • isPositiveNumberString

        public boolean isPositiveNumberString​(java.lang.String str)
        check if string consists of number characters
        Parameters:
        str - string to check
        Returns:
        boolean indicating number string

      • setIdField

        public void setIdField()
        sets the product id field via IDGenerator class

      • setIdField

        public void setIdField​(int id)
        overloaded method to set the product id via passed in value
        Parameters:
        id - product id to set

      • setMode

        public void setMode​(char m)
        sets the form submission mode
        Parameters:
        m - 'a' for Add, 'm' for Modify

      • setSelectedProduct

        public void setSelectedProduct​(Product p)
        keeps track of the user selected product via static attribute selectedProduct
        Parameters:
        p - selected product

      • setSelectedPart

        public void setSelectedPart​(Part p)
        keeps track of the user selected part via static attribute selectedPart
        Parameters:
        p - selected part

      • setSelectedAssociatedPart

        public void setSelectedAssociatedPart​(Part p)
        keeps track of the user selected associatedPart via static attribute selectedAssociatedPart
        Parameters:
        p - selected associatedPart

      • clearForm

        public void clearForm()
        clear all fields in the form, as well as the associatedParts table.

      • prerenderForm

        public void prerenderForm()
        pre-renders the form prior to user input. Adjusts form labels and field values depending on the current mode.

      • setupTable

        public void setupTable()
        set up the parts and associatedParts table. configure columns to the correct data type properties. TableView.setItems() allows the TableView to bind to its data and update changes dynamically.
